channel.title: Original Moparscape 4 jar wont run
channel.description:
I downloaded the new MoparScape 4 client, but whenever I try to run it, I get the error: Failed to load Main-Class manifest attribute from [location]\MoparScapeSource.jar.
The 3.2 MoparScape client runs just fine, I've been searching google, but it only gives results for people who have made their own jar.
Someone know what the solution to my problem is?

item.title: Original Moparscape 4 jar wont run
item.dc:creator: @mark033 mark033
item.description:
@mark033 wrote:

That .jar is a source code, you can’t run it.

Read full topic
